00033 
00034 #include "symtab.h"
00035 
00036 #include "loader/symbols.h"
00037 
00038 #include <string.h>
00039 
00040 /* Binary search is twice as large but still small. */
00041 #ifndef SYMTAB_CONF_BINARY_SEARCH
00042 #define SYMTAB_CONF_BINARY_SEARCH 1
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #if SYMTAB_CONF_BINARY_SEARCH
00047 void *
00048 symtab_lookup(const char *name)
00049 {
00050   int start, middle, end;
00051   int r;
00052   
00053   start = 0;
00054   end = symbols_nelts - 1;      /* Last entry is { 0, 0 }. */
00055 
00056   while(start <= end) {
00057     /* Check middle, divide */
00058     middle = (start + end) / 2;
00059     r = strcmp(name, symbols[middle].name);
00060     if(r < 0) {
00061       end = middle - 1;
00062     } else if(r > 0) {
00063       start = middle + 1;
00064     } else {
00065       return symbols[middle].value;   
00066     }
00067   }
00068   return NULL;
00069 }
00070 #else /* SYMTAB_CONF_BINARY_SEARCH */
00071 void *
00072 symtab_lookup(const char *name)
00073 {
00074   const struct symbols *s;
00075   for(s = symbols; s->name != NULL; ++s) {
00076     if(strcmp(name, s->name) == 0) {
00077       return s->value;
00078     }
00079   }
00080   return 0;
00081 }
00082 #endif /* SYMTAB_CONF_BINARY_SEARCH */
00083 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
